title: Ep 184: "CEO, Bitch!" with Julie Schott of Starface
itunes:title: Ep 184: "CEO, Bitch!" with Julie Schott of Starface
itunes:subtitle: Julie Schott, co-founder and CEO of Starface and former beauty director of Elle.com, talks about the acne acceptance movement, hydrocolloid patches, her must-have beauty products and services—and coffee enemas, 90 Da...
description:
Julie Schott, co-founder and CEO of Starface and former beauty director of Elle.com, talks about the acne acceptance movement, hydrocolloid patches, her must-have beauty products and services—and coffee enemas, 90 Day Fiancé, and oversharing on Instagram. Plus: Jess and Jenn discuss Coty buying Kylie Cosmetics and ways to prevent raw skin and nose flakes when you have a cold.


Want more Fat Mascara?
